casebody.data:
The State ex rel. BF Goodrich Company, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel BF Goodrich Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 337.]

(No. 97-2487 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided October 14, 1998.) Vorys, Sater, Seymour & Pease, L.L.P., Elizabeth T. Smith and Randall W. Mikes, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Mary Ann O. Rini, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission. Barkan & Neff and Robert E. DeRose, for appellee Wanetta Hamilton.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
